def transform(sequence):
    first_three = sequence[:3]
    remaining = sequence[3:]
    transformed_remaining = remaining.replace("0", "", 1).replace("0", "0", 1)
    return first_three + transformed_remaining

def transform(sequence):
    first_three = sequence[:3]
    remaining = sequence[3:]
    transformed_remaining = remaining.replace("0", "", 1).replace("0", "0", 1)
    return first_three + transformed_remaining
